name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Diverse and Genre-Spanning Celebration**

Best Kept Secret 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 52 artists, spanning a remarkable array of genres and styles. With strong representation in Electronic, Post-Punk, Hip-Hop, and Alternative Rock, the festival promises a dynamic mix of sounds, from the pulsing beats of House and Techno to the introspective melodies of Indie Folk and Dream Pop. This year’s lineup also highlights the festival’s commitment to global artistry, featuring acts from 16 countries, including the USA, Netherlands, UK, Australia, Ghana, and South Africa.

Diversity shines through not only in the music but also in the artists themselves. The lineup includes performers across gender identities, with a mix of male, female, non-binary, and mixed-gender acts, reflecting a more inclusive festival ethos. Additionally, 12 of the artists identify as people of color, showcasing a broader spectrum of cultural representation. This balance of voices ensures a rich and varied experience for festival-goers.

With an average artist rating of 7.2 (based on 76.9% of rated acts) and a staggering 98.1% of the lineup available on Spotify, Best Kept Secret 2026 is a festival for both seasoned music enthusiasts and curious listeners looking to discover new favorites. Whether you're drawn to the raw energy of Garage Rock, the soulful grooves of R&B and Funk, or the experimental sounds of Psychedelic Rock and Minimal Synth, this year’s edition offers something for everyone, making it a must-attend event for music lovers worldwide.
